name: Va-11 Hall-A: Your love is a drug DEMO
name_original: Va-11 Hall-A: Your love is a drug DEMO
description: A demo for the patreon-funded fan game I'm making. It's not finished yet, this demo exists as more of a proof of concept than anything else, and if you would like to support development in the future, please consider becoming a patron HERE: https://www.patreon.com/boxmansstuff
